text: Gordon Thomson may refer to: * Gordon Thomson (actor) (born 1945), Canadian actor * Gordon Thomson (rower) (1884–1953), British rower * Gordon Thomson (badminton) (born 1985), Scottish badminton player * Gordon Thomson (Christmas Island administrator), former Shire of Christmas Island; General Secretary of the Union of Christmas Island Workers ==See also== * Gordon Thompson (disambiguation)
title: Gordon Thomson
